HOME.NAME: Jaime
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Passionate about creating innovative and functional digital solutions.

TERMINAL.LINE1: Specialized in building modern and responsive web applications
TERMINAL.LINE2: Passionate about clean code and best development practices
TERMINAL.LINE3: Always learning new technologies and methodologies

ABOUT.BIO_TEXT1: I am a full-stack web developer with experience in Angular, NestJS, Laravel, SpringBoot, NodeJS and more, including SQL and NoSQL databases. I am passionate about building modern and efficient web applications that solve real-world problems.
ABOUT.BIO_TEXT2: Currently focused on improving my mobile development skills and learning new technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.

EXPERIENCE.DESC4: Development of web applications with Angular and NestJS. Implementation of scalable architectures and database maintenance.
EXPERIENCE.DESC3: Responsible for the complete development (frontend and backend) of key modules for managing mining exports in the SINACOM 2 platform. Robust features for seal registration, weighing, and recalculations were implemented to ensure traceability and institutional control.
EXPERIENCE.DESC2: Created user interfaces using architectural design patterns such as MVC with frameworks like Laravel, CodeIgniter, Django. Implemented responsive designs and performance optimizations. Collaborated in agile projects with Scrum methodology.
EXPERIENCE.DESC1: Developed websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with Bootstrap. Maintained existing applications and fixed bugs. Learned modern frameworks like Angular.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: My Projects
PORTFOLIO.SUBTITLE: Explore my work in web development, mobile apps, and more. Each project reflects my passion for building innovative and functional digital solutions.

PROJECT1.TITLE: Attendance Control System
PROJECT1.DESCRIPTION: This Student Attendance Control System is a comprehensive solution designed to optimize and automate the recording, monitoring, and management of student attendance in educational institutions.

PROJECT2.TITLE: Web Survey System
PROJECT2.DESCRIPTION: The Interactive Web Survey System is a dynamic and robust platform for creating, managing, distributing, and analyzing online surveys, built using Laravel and PostgreSQL.

PROJECT3.TITLE: Hotel Management System
PROJECT3.DESCRIPTION: This Hotel Management System is a scalable web application developed with Django, offering complete and intuitive tools for hotel operations.

PROJECT4.TITLE: Accounting System
PROJECT4.DESCRIPTION: A web-based Accounting System tailored for a computer products distributor, built with Laravel and PostgreSQL, ensuring performance and data integrity.

PROJECT5.TITLE: CRUD Php + MongoDB
PROJECT5.DESCRIPTION: An educational system designed for cybersecurity testing, simulating brute force attacks on a login system using PHP and MongoDB.

PROJECT6.TITLE: Online Billing System
PROJECT6.DESCRIPTION: A complete web billing system using CodeIgniter and PostgreSQL, automating invoice creation and management for businesses.

PROJECT7.TITLE: Minerals Commercialization System
PROJECT7.DESCRIPTION: A Laravel-based system for internal minerals trade management, using PostgreSQL for robust transaction and traceability handling.

PROJECT8.TITLE: Minerals Export System
PROJECT8.DESCRIPTION: A full-featured application with Angular and NestJS for data management, digital signatures, user roles, and secure APIs.

PROJECT9.TITLE: Academic System
PROJECT9.DESCRIPTION: Built with Angular and NestJS, this system manages academic operations with a modern UI based on AdminLTE and a robust backend architecture.

PROJECT10.TITLE: Restaurant App
PROJECT10.DESCRIPTION: A dynamic and modular app for restaurants using Angular, PrimeNG, and NestJS, providing an intuitive UI and scalable backend.
